name: Jewel Link Double Pack: Atlantic Quest and Galactic Quest
overview: Jewel Link: Galactic Quest Help Captain Smith of the Starship Victory on an intergalactic adventure to save the planets! A massive explosion has rocked the entire cosmos - a gigantic star has gone supernova, use your match-3 skills to search galactic locations and help destroy the space debris! - Search 12 galactic locations - Solve over 100 match-3 levels - Complete challenging mini-games - Includes 3 game modes - Swap/Chains/Group - Collect powerful extras to use in your quest to save the planets! Jewel Link: Atlantic Quest A tanker has capsized leaking tons of oil into the ocean! Join four marine friends in this exciting puzzle adventure to save the reef and it's underwater inhabitants. Use your match-3 skills to clear the contaminated water before it's too late! - Includes 3 game modes - Swap / Chains / Group - Solve over 120 match-3 levels - Search 12 underwater locations - Collect power extras to help rescue the ocean!
